## Stack
- Java (Spring Boot)
- React
- Vite
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS

### Java
In Java always use Maven as build tool and JUnit as test framework.
In Java always use UPPERCASE for private field names.
In Java always use camelCase for public field names.
